Greetings Greetings, web traveler. You are currently in downtown Montreal, Canada. I'm glad you decided to drop by. My home page is unfortunately spartan, this mostly due to a certain thesis that I am trying to finish up. Please feel free to browse my meager lists below. Some stuff about me Work I offer my services as systems manager to the School of Computer Science. I am currently on leave, working on my thesis.
